This is a review for the “Trendy Queen Women’s Oversized Sweatshirts Crewneck Hoodies Color Block Long Sleeve Pullover Fall Clothes 2024.”  Wow, this sweater is incredibly soft! I’ve seen this material a lot this season, so I had to order one and give it a try. I’m thrilled to say it did not disappoint! The outside is silky soft, while the interior is wonderfully fuzzy. I love wearing my clothes as much as possible and dislike fast fashion, so I’m curious to see if this material will stand the test of time. I’ll be wearing this a lot this winter, and if it doesn’t wash well, I’ll update this review. For now, it’s definitely five stars!

This Trendy Queen Women’s Oversized Sweatshirt is an exceptional piece that combines comfort, style, and versatility. It features a cozy crewneck design, long sleeves, and a flattering color block detail that elevates its aesthetic appeal.  On first impression, the sweatshirt's attention to detail is evident in the impeccable stitching and high-quality fabric used in its construction. The sweatshirt offers a luxurious feel and keeps you warm and comfortable all season long.  The eye-catching two-tone color combination adds a touch of sophistication to this classic silhouette. It breaks away from the monotony of plain sweatshirts by introducing a modern and stylish element.  The oversized fit provides a relaxed and effortless look, perfect for casual outings, running errands, or simply lounging at home. This sweatshirt's versatility extends beyond its comfort and style, as it seamlessly pairs with a variety of bottoms, from leggings and jeans to skirts and shorts.  In conclusion, the Trendy Queen Women’s Oversized Sweatshirt is a must-have for any fashion-forward woman who values comfort and style. Its exceptional quality, cozy design, and sophisticated color block detail make it an investment piece that will remain a staple in your wardrobe for seasons.

评论概述: Stylish, thick, and soft on the inside.
评论详情: The reason I ordered this was because I loved the look of the contrasting trim of the collar, ribbed cuffs, and stripe down the length of the arms.  I may iron on a team logo and jersey number on the sleeve stripe.  I ordered it in size medium and the color "gray", which has white contrasting trim.This color block sweatshirt is very thick.  The outside is a smooth knit and the inside fleece is soft and fuzzy.  The oversized fit is also quite boxy.  Compared to other oversized items I have, I feel like this is a little bit disproportionately wide -  If I went up a size for more length, the additional width would be way too much.  But that's just me.  It's made of 50-50 cotton and polyester.  I washed and dried it with my regular "lights".It's a stylish and good quality sweatshirt. I did not see any loose threads of mis-sewn seams.

Letti Here! This block colored sweatshirt in black and tan is very comfortable and is a nice length. The black wrists and the black stripe down the sleeves creates a nice look. This casual look works with jeans, black slacks or leggings. This is a really nice sweatshirt to wear to work as I work in retail. It is machine washable which I really like.

This color lock sweatshirt is made of a very thick fleece material. The inside is soft, cozy and warm, and the fit is very oversized and boxy. The contrasting trim is a fun detail and gives you space for fun designs if you are doing to print on it. The cuffs are robbed and fit comfortably around my wrists, not feeling too loose. Overall, it’s a thick good quality sweatshirt that is well made and is worth the price.

What’s not to love about a sweatshirt that’s fantastic quality? This is everything a sweatshirt should be….soft, comfortable, warm, oversized to perfection, and good looking. I usually wear a L in tops but per the size chart went with a Medium and it’s spot on. Love the color blocking, gives the sweatshirt visual interest. The only way they could have made this any better is if it had a front pocket but I’m not complaining🙂

评论概述: A thick, oversized sweatshirt with soft fleece on the inside.
评论详情: This fit me exactly how I like! Loose, but not so much that it gets in my way of free movement. This is a true sweatshirt with soft fleece on the inside of it. Nice and thick for good warmth in colder days to come. It was a lot too warm for the summer temperatures that I had the day I tried this on and took the photos! Despite the thickness of the material, it is not overly heavy in weight, and that makes it super comfy to wear. It is well made and doesn't have loose threads or other flaws that I could see.  I really like this sweatshirt. So much so that I have ordered another in a different color! The price listed on the product page is definitely fair and the sweatshirt is worth it. I highly recommend this sweatshirt.

It's a very nice and cozy sweatshirt.  I maybe should have sized up for the super roomy oversized fit - I got my normal size and while it is not tight by any means it just looks kinda puffy.  Also after washing some of the shrink wrap wrinkles were still there faintly.  I did dry it but I don't like doing anything special for my  sweatshirts, they just need to be cleaned.  I will wear it, I like it just for the fit in the picture you will need to size up.

评论概述: Comfy sweatshirt. Love the color combo
评论详情: This is a very comfy heavy-weight sweatshirt. I love the color block contrast down the arms, around the collar, and at the waist. Good oversized fit in my recommended size small. It's made of 50% polyester 50% cotton, so I washed in cold, put in a low heat dryer for a few minutes to eliminate wrinkles, and then hung to dry. No shrinkage. Very pleased.
Very good quality! Super cute sweatshirt. It’s a little Oversized but I wouldn’t say very over sized.

I love this Trendy Queen Oversized Sweat Shirt, I normally wear a Medium but ordered size Small instead.  I'm 5'4", 115 lbs and this sweat shirt is huge on me.  The material is 50/50 Cotton/Polyester and it's quite thick and comfy.  The color is like a putty tan color with black band around the collar, stripes down both sleeves and a nice thick band around the waist.  This is super comfy and cute.
I ordered the navy in a large and the khaki in a medium. I’m 5'5 and 120 lbs. I love them both but the medium is a better fit. It is oversized. I love them!
I was pleased with this sweatshirt. I got my usual medium and its just the right fit. The colorblocking is nice on this one.

This sweater looks exactly as pictured, quality and color. I usually wear size L in sweaters and jackets but I decided to size up to XL for comfort (I wanted extra space in the sleeves and I certainly got it.) The sleeves are perfect, but the bottom band is a little too loose for my preference so the overall look is slightly boxy, but that is likely because I sized up. The inside is soft and not itchy and the material overall is not too heavy (thicker and more texture on the black lines) but overall comfy just like I wanted!

评论概述: Disappointing quality, poorly cut, and not flattering
评论详情: I love oversized sweatshirts and have a large collection of them, so I grabbed this one as soon as I saw it. I ordered a small, which is my usual size in these types of sweatshirts, and it does fit similarly to others.  Unfortunately, though, it turned out to look better online than in person and the cut even seems to be different than what's depicted. The banding at the bottom is tighter than the cut at the top of the garment, which creates an odd and very unflattering shape with bulky shoulders and slimmer hip area (rather than what's shown in the listing pictures).  Cutting and stitching is also unevenly done, which causes the neckline to pucker weirdly and not lay right. Some of the seams don't line up as they should, and noticeably so, and sewing is done inconsistently, so some seams move from one side to the other, which creates odd puckering and puffing in places. The stripes on the arms are also unevenly cut so that they're thicker in parts and thinner in others, and again, noticeably so.  The pink color is far more muted and less interesting than it appears online, and not a color I would've ordered if the pictures were true to reality.  Care instructions are also not as friendly as I would’ve liked. I was careful to choose a sweatshirt that was machine washable since I hate hand washing those. This one technically is, as claimed, but requires cold water, which means it essentially will need to be run separately from my other clothes or hand washed.  The only positives I could find are that the sweatshirt material is thick and the lining is soft and fuzzy, but given I won't be wearing something this poorly done, those are moot points.  Bottom line, I don't recommend this at all. It's poorly made for the most part, and I can't imagine it will look good on many people.

I love this sweatshirt. It’s so cute and cozy, and the pink color just makes me happy. I’m always wearing sweatshirts because I work from home and my husband keeps the a/c so cold. I’m generally wear a size medium but I did size up in this, even though it’s already oversized. I just like the look of it that way. And it’s super comfortable (material is 50% polyester, 50%cotton).  If you’re in need of a cute sweatshirt then go for it!
This is a great sweatshirt for tall girls. It is so long, the perfect length. It is soft, comfortable, and fits true to size. The coffee and black color combo is super cute.
I'm 5'3 130lbs and ordered a medium... it's very very oversized, but I like that.  Definitely could have done a small too. Material feels okay, basic fleece on inside. It's definitely warm.
Really thick quality material and nice detail on sleeves. Fit is oversized for sure so buyer beware.
